channel.title: EASY QUESTION! Editing My 562 Servers Chatbox Message! Free Co-Owner If Fixed!
channel.description:
[size=18pt]WHOEVER HELPS ME WITH THIS WILL GET CO-OWNER ON MY NEW 562 SERVER![/size]
Now, Before anyone comes in here and starts saying I'm a Leeeeeeecherrrr! I AM NOT! I'm giving 95% credit to Evo, The Creater Of Evolution-X... Now.. I'm having problems.. I'm trying to change this message that pops up at the begging of logging in everytime to say My server and forums.. [IMG]http://i286.photobucket.com/albums/ll86/killacam3160/CHAT.png[/img] But sadly whenever I type it in on the search bar in the "source" folder... I can't find it, could someone tell me how to find it? or how to change it.. I really need it..

item.description:
@thehorrors wrote:

try
(ur source) - data - scripts - authentication. look around in there.

thats how it was on my 562. although, im not sure what your on about as i cant see a picture but i hope this helps you =)
